thread.title: WATCH: North Carolina fan dressed as Grayson Allen trips people around UNC campus
thread.title_full: WATCH: North Carolina fan dressed as Grayson Allen trips people around UNC campus

author: Kyle Boone
title: WATCH: North Carolina fan dressed as Grayson Allen trips people around UNC campus
text:
12m ago â€¢ 1 min read 
Thursday night's Tobacco Road rivalry game between Duke and North Carolina is as intense as they come in all of sports. The matchup is almost always a good one, and historically the series hasn't disappointed. 
In fact, over the last 96 meetings, each team has won 48 times. And each team has scored exactly 7,437 points. So fans on both sides of the fence take this very seriously in the state of North Carolina. 
Ahead of Thursday night's game, one North Carolina fan and student, Joe Nail, took the rivalry to a new level by trolling a Blue Devils beloved star. Nail dressed up as Grayson Allen , the polarizing Duke player who has a history of tripping opposing players. So naturally, Nail did the same, tripping random students across the Chapel Hill campus. 
We know one thing: Nail likely doesn't have a career in acting. But the video, which is very much staged and fake as part of the comedy, is pretty hilarious in itself. He gets a B+ for effort, and a solid A- for the trolling efforts. Add a comment
